thread.title_full: AgroPages-Incotec launches microplastic-free film coat for sunflower at Euroseeds-Agricultural news

title: AgroPages-Incotec launches microplastic-free film coat for sunflower at Euroseeds-Agricultural news
text: Oct. 4, 2024 Incotec is introducing the newest microplastic-free film coat, Disco Blue L-1523, for sunflower seeds at the Euroseeds Congress 2024, taking place in Copenhagen, Denmark, from 13-16 October. Disco Blue L-153, Incotec’s newest microplastic-free film coating for sunflower seeds This product has an attractive intense blue colour and is microplastic-free. It was developed to meet customer requirements for an intense blue film coating. Mariska Wever, Marketing Lead: ″Our commitment to sustainability and top-quality performance is reflected in Disco Blue L-1523. This product not only demonstrates outstanding performance in meeting industry standards, but it also provides optimal processing and application efficiency and has excellent cosmetic value.″ Incotec will have a team present at the Euroseeds Congress. To schedule an appointment to discuss seed enhancement solutions or get an update on the latest developments, email liesbeth.henningheim@incotec.com.
